# <a name="keyboard-shortcuts-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="5a43d-102">Métodos abreviados de teclado de Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5a43d-102">Keyboard shortcuts in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5a43d-103">En Outlook.com, puede usar los mismos métodos abreviados de teclado que el servicio de correo electrónico con el que está trabajando, como gmail, Yahoo mail o Outlook.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5a43d-103">In Outlook.com you can use the same keyboard shortcuts as the email service you're used to working with, such as Gmail, Yahoo Mail, or Outlook.com.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5a43d-104">Vaya a [configuración de accesibilidad](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5a43d-104">Go to [Accessibility settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2080840) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="5a43d-105">**Settings**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5a43d-105">**Settings**</span></span> 
 > <span data-ttu-id="5a43d-106">**Ver toda la configuración** > de Outlook**accesibilidad\*\*\*\*General** > ) y elegir los métodos abreviados de teclado que desea usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5a43d-106">**View all Outlook settings** > **General** > **Accessibility**) and choose which keyboard shortcuts you'd like use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5a43d-107">Para ver la lista completa de los métodos abreviados de teclado, vea [Outlook.com métodos abreviados de teclado](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5a43d-107">To see the full list of keyboard shortcuts, see [Outlook.com keyboard shortcuts](https://support.office.com/article/708d907e-4398-4fc6-9a9a-4fc72bccec16?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
